tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE voter_addresses (
    address_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT REFERENCES voters(voter_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    street_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    city VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    postal_code VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE voter_identifications (
    identification_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    voter_id INT REFERENCES voters(voter_id) ON DELETE CASCADE,
    identification_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    issue_date DATE NOT NULL,
    expiration_date DATE NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE voter_addresses (
 address_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 voter_id INT,
 street VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
 city VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 state VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 zip_code VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
 FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voter_identifications (
 id_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 voter_id INT,
 id_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
 id_number VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 issue_date DATE,
 expiration_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voter_history (
 history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 voter_id INT,
 registration_date DATE,
 status VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 voting_history TEXT,
 FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id)
);

CREATE TABLE voter_roles (
 role_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 voter_id INT,
 role_name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
 grant_date DATE,
 expiry_date DATE,
 FOREIGN KEY (voter_id) REFERENCES voters(voter_id)
);
